tailored_cv_pdf.task: Create a tailored CV for this specific job application
instructions: Output ONLY the tailored CV content - NO conversational text, NO introductions like 'Here is...' or 'Gerne...'
Start directly with the CV content (e.g., candidate name or professional profile)
Preserve ALL factual information from the original CV - DO NOT invent or change facts
Only include travel willingness/percentage if explicitly mentioned in the original CV - DO NOT add or infer it
Emphasize experiences and skills most relevant to this specific job posting
Maintain professional CV formatting with clear sections
Keep the same level of detail as the original CV
tailored_cv_pdf.output_format: Direct CV content starting with candidate name

tailored_cv_editable.task: Create an editable tailored CV with comments explaining each adaptation
instructions: Output ONLY the tailored CV content with inline comments
Add [COMMENT: explanation] markers to explain adaptations
Preserve ALL factual information from the original CV
Highlight sections tailored for this specific job
Maintain professional CV formatting
Make it easy to edit and customize further
tailored_cv_editable.length_guideline: Same as original CV plus comments

tailored_cv_one_page.task: Create a compact one-page CV highlighting only the most relevant experience
instructions: Output ONLY the one-page CV content
Prioritize most relevant experience and skills for this job
Be extremely concise while maintaining professionalism
Use bullet points effectively
Preserve factual accuracy
Fit everything on ONE page

motivational_letter_pdf.task: Write a motivational letter for this job application
instructions: Output ONLY the motivational letter content - NO conversational text, NO introductions like 'Here is...' or 'Gerne...'
Start directly with the letter (e.g., greeting and opening paragraph)
Use facts from the candidate's CV - DO NOT invent experiences or qualifications
Write a formal, compelling letter explaining why the candidate is motivated and qualified for this role
Include proper letter formatting (greeting, body paragraphs, closing)
Keep it concise (typically 1 page)
motivational_letter_pdf.output_format: Direct letter content with proper formatting

motivational_letter_editable.task: Write an editable motivational letter with suggestions for personalization
instructions: Output the motivational letter with [SUGGESTION: ...] markers for personalization
Indicate where candidate can add personal anecdotes
Use facts from CV but leave room for customization
Professional and formal tone
Proper letter formatting

email_formal.task: Write a formal email to submit a job application
instructions: Output ONLY the email content - NO conversational text, NO introductions like 'Here is...'
Start directly with the email greeting
Write a concise, professional email (3-5 sentences) introducing the attached application documents
Include: greeting, brief introduction, mention of attached documents, expression of interest, closing
Keep it professional and to the point

email_linkedin.task: Write a LinkedIn direct message to a recruiter for this position
instructions: Output ONLY the LinkedIn message content - NO conversational text, NO meta-commentary
Start directly with the message greeting
Write a brief, engaging message (max 200 words)
Include: greeting, brief introduction, expression of interest, call to action
Keep it professional but conversational (appropriate for LinkedIn)

match_score_report.task: Create a detailed match score report analyzing how well the candidate fits this job
instructions: Provide an overall match score (0-100)
List 3-5 key strengths that align with job requirements
Identify 2-4 gaps or missing qualifications
Provide 2-3 actionable recommendations for improvement
Be honest and objective in the analysis
Structure the report clearly with sections
match_score_report.output_format: Structured report with score, strengths, gaps, recommendations

company_intelligence_briefing.task: Create a company intelligence briefing for interview preparation
instructions: Research and summarize company overview
Analyze company culture signals
Identify strategic talking points
Provide lightweight SWOT analysis
Note hiring patterns if available
Include interview preparation tips

interview_preparation_pack.task: Create an interview preparation guide for this role
instructions: List 8-12 likely interview questions for this role
Provide tailored answers using STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result)
Create a compelling 30-second pitch
Highlight key talking points from CV
Include preparation checklist for interview day
Be specific to this role and candidate's background

role_specific_portfolio.task: Create a one-page portfolio highlighting achievements relevant to this role
instructions: Highlight 3-5 key achievements aligned with job requirements
Include measurable results and metrics where available
Use visual-friendly formatting (bullet points, sections)
Focus on impact and outcomes
Keep it to ONE page
Make it scannable and impressive
Suggest an improved 'About' section (3-5 paragraphs)
Recommend an optimized headline
List 10-15 key skills to add/highlight
Provide keywords for recruiter discovery
Suggest job title optimizations
Include tips for profile completeness

executive_summary.task: Create an executive summary / personal profile for the candidate
instructions: Write a compelling one-page career story
Highlight value proposition and unique selling points
Focus on leadership and strategic impact
Include career highlights and key achievements
Professional tone suitable for senior positions
Include placeholder for QR code to portfolio/LinkedIn

skill_gap_report.task: Create a skill gap analysis and upskilling recommendation report
instructions: Identify missing skills compared to job requirements
Prioritize skills by importance (critical, important, nice-to-have)
Suggest specific courses and certifications
Provide learning paths with time estimates
Include both technical and soft skills
Be constructive and actionable

reference_summary.task: Create an AI-verified reference summary consolidating reference letters
instructions: Extract and consolidate key strengths from all reference letters
Summarize consistent themes across references
Include notable recommendations or endorsements
Add verification notice
Professional structured format
Highlight unique qualifications mentioned
